Asian.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: someone from Asia, or whose family originally came from Asia, especially India or Pakistan
Asian.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: someone from Asia, or whose family originally came from Asia, especially from Japan, China, Korea etc
Asian.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: from or relating to Asia, especially India or Pakistan
Asian.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: from or relating to Asia, especially Japan, China, Korea etc
